title: Storyful
description: Storyful is known for its vibrant and professional color palette that reflects its expertise in news verification and media. The color #F97200, a bright orange, signifies energy and creativity, while #010101, a deep black, adds a touch of sophistication and professionalism. The shade #8B8B64 brings a warm, earthy tone complementing the bold colors, and #BBBDC0 provides a neutral balance, adding a hint of modernity and ease. These colors contribute to Storyful's distinct brand identity, recognized across multiple digital media platforms.
